post.text: I have proposed the largest tax reduction of ANY candidate - who has run for President this year. It is a start, in MAKING AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: Josiah
comment.text: One industry that needs to come back is sewing factories. There were 15 here locally when we moved here in 1988, now there is 1. We need to start making our clothing, home goods etc. here again. 1000's were put out of work when they all went overseas.

replies.author: Jordan
replies.text: Josiah he wants to get manufacturing back to the USA. We need Pennsylvania to win. Spread the word I am a small town guy from Upstate Ny Hillary Clinton did NOTHING. Trump is our only hope

replies.author: Kevin
replies.text: Maybe he can start by having his own Trump products made here instead of Mexico, Bangladesh, China and Vietnam. Oh wait, he said in 2012 "well they have to work too."

replies.author: William
replies.text: We need all factories back. We don't need other countries making our goods.

replies.author: Wade
replies.text: Kevin agree with you!! Trump says what he thinks his supporters want to hear. Actions speak louder than words!! Estate tax (death tax) is only for the 5million plus folks. Not for us the middle class. Open your minds and check what he says. You will find he is misleading you
